meanings.definition: Resembling jelly in consistency or texture.
meanings.sent1: The jellylike substance wobbled on the plate.
meanings.sent2: Her skin felt jellylike after applying moisturizer.
meanings.sent3: The jellylike dessert danced on the spoon playfully.
meanings.sent4: The jellylike clouds floated lazily in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The jellylike material oozed through the cracks.

meanings.sent1: The jellylike fish slipped out of his hands.
meanings.sent2: The jellylike texture of the pudding was delightful.
meanings.sent3: She giggled as her jellylike shoes squished with each step.
meanings.sent4: The jellylike heart of the matter was hard to grasp.
meanings.sent5: The jellylike consistency of the slime made it hard to hold.
